## Form.showDatePicker() method

Show the datepicker popup

**Signature:**

```typescript
showDatePicker(block: string, field: string, row?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block associated with the datepicker. |
|  field | string | The field associated with the datepicker. |
|  row | number | _(Optional)_ The row number (optional). |

**Returns:**

void
